mushaf_layout.translation_desc: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, The Clear Quran
mushaf_layout.mushaf_layout_and_font_desc: Choose the different Mushaf you wish to use.

hidden_verses.hidden_verses_desc: Hide the words that you haven't recited yet, to practice your memorization

marking.show_tajweed_colors_desc: Color letters with distinct colors according to Tajweed rules to make it easier to know which rules to apply while reciting.
marking.highlight_mistake_history_desc: Highlight the mistakes you commonly make according to how often you've been making them.
marking.similar_phrases_desc: Color similar phrases (Mutashabihat) with distinct colors to identity patterns and avoid confusing different verses.
